name: find-a-friend
description: - [ ] It should be able to register a pet; - [ ] It should be able to list all pets available for adoption in a city; - [ ] It should be able to filter pets by its characteristcs; - [ ] It should be able to view details about a pet for adoption; - [ ] It should be able to register as an ORG; - [ ] It should be able to login as an ORG;
